mapper.insert: insert into DBEB.IGNITE1 (FIELD_ONE, FIELD_TWO, FIELD_THREE, FIELD_FOUR) values (#{fieldOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldThree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldFour,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select FIELD_ONE, FIELD_TWO, FIELD_THREE, FIELD_FOUR from DBEB.IGNITE1
